title.native: Aランクパーティを離脱した俺は、元教え子たちと迷宮深部を目指す。
title.romaji: A-Rank Party wo Ridatsu Shita Ore wa, Moto Oshiegotachi to Meikyuu Shinbu wo Mezasu.
title.english: I Left My A-Rank Party to Help My Former Students Reach the Dungeon Depths!

description:
Yuke, a red mage, angrily declares that he's leaving Thunder Pike, the A-rank party he's been with for five years, because he's fed up with being insulted and ridiculed by the other members.

While searching for a new party, he runs into his former students Marina, Silk, and Rain, and decides to join their party, Clover. Encouraged by their admiration of him as their teacher, Yuke leads them in completing several quests that show off his own extraordinary magic and skills while bringing out the girls' abilities to their fullest.

Then, through an "adventure broadcast" by an artifact known as Camelot, Clover becomes well-known throughout society. The party's dream is to conquer Achromatic Darkness, the most challenging dungeon of all, but as they take on other dungeons in hopes of eventually achieving that goal, they gradually become entangled in chaos that threatens the whole world...

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: After Leaving the A-Rank Party, I Aim for the Deep Part of the Labyrinth With My Former Students
Покинув группу А-ранга, я направился вместе со своими бывшими учениками в глубины лабиринта
Aku Meninggalkan Regu Peringkat-A untuk Membantu Mantan Muridku
Sau khi rời khỏi Tổ đội hạng A, Tôi thám hiểm Mê cung cùng Đệ tử cũ

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

node.description:
**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/katsuono)**

**Katsumi Ono** is a Japanese director, supervisor, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamazacky) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/38741)

Masakazu Yamazaki is a Japanese designer and animator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamazacky) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/38741)

Masakazu Yamazaki is a Japanese designer and animator.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋晃_(アニメーター%29)

Affiliated with [Bandai Namco Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/6116/). Noted for his work in the Precure franchise.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/147908/)._
__Shuuhei Abe__ is a Japanese sound director and sound production manager.

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).

Kazuma Kawamura is a Japanese singer, dancer and actor. He is a member of the J-Pop group [The Rampage from Exile Tribe](https://anilist.co/staff/243760) and represented with LDH. On January 29, 2025, he made his solo debut under the stage name L.E.I.
